original_title: The ParaPod:  A Very British Ghost Hunt
overview: A lifelong believer in the paranormal invites a hardwired sceptic on a road trip of the UKâ€™s most famous haunted locations, in an attempt to convince him of the existence of ghosts. A journey of true discovery, shocks, emotional turmoil, hilarious conflict and a bewildering climax.
tagline: You won't believe it... but he will!
title: The ParaPod:  A Very British Ghost Hunt
